IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package algorithms :: Module orientation :: Class OrientCF

Class OrientCF

source code

Implementation of the complementary filter used on the Orient IMU.

See A. Young, M. Ling, and D. K. Arvind. "Orient-2: A Realtime Wireless Posture Tracking System using Local Orientation Estimation". in Proc. 4th Workshop on Embedded Network Sensors, pp 53-57. ACM, 2007.

Method Details

__init__(self, initialTime, initialRotation, k, aT, **kwargs)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise orientation filter.

Parameters:
  • initialTime - Initial time.
  • initialRotation - Initial rotation (Quaternion).
  • k - Filter blending co-efficient (float). At each timestep, a correction will be applied of 1/k times the difference between the gyro integration and vector observation results.
  • aT - acceleration threshold (float). The correction step will only be performed if the condition abs(norm(accel) - 1) <= aT is met.
Decorators:
  • @prepend_method_doc(BachmannCF)
